name: Gyro Plate
description: A mix of seasoned lamb and beef, slow-cooked on a vertical rotisserie. Served with Greek salad, seasoned rice, pita bread, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Chicken Gyro Plate
description: Marinated chicken, slow-cooked on a vertical rotisserie. Served with Greek salad, seasoned rice, pita bread, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Falafel Plate (Vegetarian)
description: Ground chickpeas, parsley, and spices shaped into balls and deep-fried until golden. Served with Greek salad, seasoned rice, pita bread, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Combo Plate
description: Your choice of any two meats (Gyro, Chicken Gyro). Served with Greek salad, seasoned rice, pita bread, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Gyro Sandwich
description: A mix of seasoned lamb and beef, shaved from a vertical rotisserie and wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Chicken Gyro Sandwich
description: Marinated and grilled chicken, shaved from a vertical rotisserie and wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Falafel Sandwich (Vegetarian)
description: Crispy, deep-fried chickpea balls (falafel) wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Greek Salad
description: A fresh bed of lettuce with tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, feta cheese, and Kalamata olives, tossed in a classic Greek dressing. Add gyro meat for an additional charge.

name: Gyro Salad
description: Our fresh Greek salad topped with a generous portion of savory lamb and beef gyro meat.

name: Chicken Salad
description: Our fresh Greek salad topped with a generous portion of marinated and grilled chicken gyro meat.

name: Fries
description: A generous side of crispy, golden french fries, lightly salted.

name: Greek Fries
description: Our crispy golden fries topped with crumbled feta cheese and a sprinkle of Greek seasoning.

name: Onion Rings
description: A classic side of thick-cut onion rings, battered and deep-fried until golden and crispy.

name: Hummus with Pita
description: A classic Mediterranean starter of creamy chickpea and tahini dip (hummus), served with slices of warm pita bread for dipping.

name: Baklava
description: A rich, sweet dessert pastry made of layers of flaky filo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with a delicious honey syrup.

name: Fountain Drinks
description: Your choice of refreshing fountain soda. Options include Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Fanta, and Lemonade.

name: Bottled Water
description: A simple bottle of purified spring water to quench your thirst.
